dct_title_s: Guide map of Jerusalem [cartographic material]. (Back cover)
dct_description_sm: On inner back cover map: "Palestine and southern Syria". On cover: "Obtainable at the Matson photo service, Jerusalem". "Copyright Boulos Afif Jerusalem."--Cover. Map shows: the Old CIty seven gates, and quarters,  tourist points of interest; Greek, tourist points of interest; Greek, German, and Talbiya colonies, places of worship, cemeteries, consulates, bus routes, police stations. Margin decorated with palm leaves. Selected buildings are shown pictorially.
